scripts.postinstall: shx cp -n src/env/local.template.ts src/env/local.ts && shx cp -n src/env/local.ts src/env/env.ts
scripts.start:local: shx cp src/env/local.ts src/env/env.ts && next dev --port 8000
scripts.test: shx cp src/env/local.ts src/env/env.ts && TZ=utc vitest run
scripts.test:watch: shx cp src/env/local.ts src/env/env.ts && TZ=utc vitest
scripts.build:local: shx cp src/env/local.ts src/env/env.ts && npm run build:common
scripts.build:dev: shx cp src/env/dev.ts src/env/env.ts && npm run build:common
scripts.build:prod: shx cp src/env/prod.ts src/env/env.ts && npm run build:common
scripts.build:common: npm run build:common:raise && npm run build:common:mwa
scripts.build:common:raise: npm run type-check && shx rm -rf dist/raise && RAISE_BRAND=RAISE next build
scripts.build:common:mwa: shx rm -rf ../web-mwa && shx mkdir ../web-mwa && shx cp -r * ../web-mwa && cd ../web-mwa && shx sed -i "s/@raise\/web/@raise\/web-mwa/g" package.json && mv src/pages src/pages-all && mv src/pages-all/cambridge src/pages && shx sed -i "s/from '..\//from '/g" src/pages/* && cp src/pages-all/_*.tsx src/pages && shx rm -rf src/pages-all&& npm run type-check && shx rm -rf ../web/dist/mwa && RAISE_BRAND=MWA next build && cd ../web && mv ../web-mwa/dist/mwa dist/mwa && shx rm -rf ../web-mwa
